name: Robb'er Demo
description:
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=646640898

Who is Robb'er?

Robb'er is a hardcore platform game which you rob bank by controlling a cube whose name is Robb.

Gameplay

You have to get through to the safe's door by avoiding the lasers and other traps and gathering the D and P letters which are behind the doors. The chapter restarts if you reach the safe's door without collecting both of them.

30 different bank. (It will increase.)

Why cube?

As a platform lover, cube seemed easier to control to me. (Nope, it's not about my laziness.)

What are the D and P?

D is for the number of the room where the safe located.
P is for the safe's password.
